name: json-get
title: JSON GET Request
description: Execute a JSON HTTP GET request to any URL with configurable query parameters and headers (defaults to JSON)

inputs.name: URL
inputs.description: The base URL to make the GET request to (e.g., https://api.example.com/v1/users)

inputs.name: Queries
inputs.description: Query parameters as a JSON string (e.g., {"userId": "123", "status": "active"})

inputs.name: Headers
inputs.description: Headers as a JSON string (e.g., {"Accept": "application/json", "Authorization": "Bearer token"})
